plot: A young girl, a student, is upset by the hypocrisy and dishonesty around her. She looks for answers to all the questions that upset her in the men whom she dates. But nobody is courageous ...
title: Hrazhesht sahmanagtzits andin
plot_es: A young girl, a student, is upset by the hypocrisy and dishonesty around her. She looks for answers to all the questions that upset her in the men whom she dates. But nobody is courageous ...
plot_en: A young girl, a student, is upset by the hypocrisy and dishonesty around her. She looks for answers to all the questions that upset her in the men whom she dates. But nobody is courageous ...
